external_games.name: Night of Full Moon - Contract of Soul

name: Night of Full Moon: Contract of Soul
summary: Little Red Riding Hood becomes silent these days. She speaks less in public, but likes talking to herself. "Ninety-ninth soul..." Little Red murmuring. With but one more soul, she will complete the contract with the Reaper. However, to find the one last soul is more difficult than she could have imagined...
